author: jgm
content:
Tracking the Medalla inactivity leak, looks like we're still on target for just over another week of lack of finality before validators start being kicked.

Note that the inactive validator in the graph started with ~30ETH, so it could be another day beyond this before we have removed enough for finality to resume.
